thread.section_title: Fine Rug Collection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Rug Collection | finerugcollection.com
thread.title: Karen
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: When my rug order wasn't shipped in a timely manner I email them and then received an email that said my order had been cancelled without giving me any reason. At least my money was credited back to me. Now I hesitate to order again in case it happens again. I needed my rug and now I don't have it.
